item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Beyond the route: Introducing granular MTA bus speed data (111 points | 28 comments)
2. Why Most Published Research Findings Are False (13 points | 2 comments)
3. On Impactful AI Research (30 points | 3 comments)
4. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (576 points | 170 comments)
5. Launch HN: Modern Realty (YC S24) – AI Real Estate Agent for Home Buyers (89 points | 187 comments)
6. Move Fast and Abandon Things (298 points | 118 comments)
7. GSoC'24: Differentiable Logic for Interactive Systems and Generative Music (44 points | 3 comments)
8. Winamp Legacy player source code (545 points | 256 comments)
9. "Creounity Time Machine", the universal date converter for coin collectors (27 points | discuss)
10. Neat Randomized Algorithms: RandDiag for Rapidly Diagonalizing Normal Matrices (35 points | 3 comments)
11. Show HN: JSON For You – Visualize JSON in graph or table views (133 points | 35 comments)
12. Wasm2Mpy: Compiling WASM to MicroPython so it can run on Raspberrys (25 points | 8 comments)
13. Google Cache Is Fully Dead (80 points | 47 comments)
14. Fully documented source code for Lander on the Acorn Archimedes (142 points | 35 comments)
15. Show HN: Velvet – Store OpenAI requests in your own DB (8 points | 2 comments)
16. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in prison (46 points | 51 comments)
17. Attracting and Retaining Debian Contributors (103 points | 76 comments)
18. DOJ accuses Visa of monopoly that affects price of 'nearly everything’ (240 points | 174 comments)
19. The quest to build a telescope on the moon (108 points | 63 comments)
20. Jetstream: Shrinking the AT Protocol Firehose by >99% (140 points | 95 comments)
21. Twitter/X will let people you've blocked see your posts (64 points | 157 comments)
22. Galilean Moons and Determination of Longitude (11 points | discuss)
23. 45 years ago CompuServe connected the world before the World Wide Web (102 points | 90 comments)
24. Mental-1, a Brainfuck CPU (9 points | discuss)
25. Maker Pipe – Structural Pipe Fittings for DIY Builders (219 points | 111 comments)
26. OpenBSD now enforcing no invalid NUL characters in shell scripts (145 points | 129 comments)
27. Life without Aadhaar (62 points | 59 comments)
28. Giving T cells extra batteries supercharges them against cancer (158 points | 68 comments)
29. $1B Solar and Battery Storage Project Breaks Ground in Utah (6 points | discuss)
30. Radioactive Tape Dispenser (1970s) (82 points | 46 comments)
